q1: How do I convert PSI to bar?
a1: 1 PSI ≈ 0.0689 bar. Enter the PSI value and select bar as the target unit.
a2: Standard atmospheric pressure (1 atm) = 101,325 Pa = 14.696 PSI = 1.01325 bar.
a3: Pascal, kPa, MPa, bar, atmospheres, PSI, mmHg, and Torr.
q4: What is the difference between mmHg and Torr?
a4: They are nearly identical. 1 Torr ≈ 1 mmHg (the difference is negligible for most purposes).
